attributes.action: give an undertaking to the taxpayer that if any compensation is ordered to be paid to the employee who is suing HBOS for sexual harassment then that payment will be made by the HBOS employee who committed the sexual harassment and NOT dumped on the taxpayer to pay!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a taxpayer and a shareholder in HBOS (through government inefficiency) and I DID NOT COMMIT SEXUAL HARASSMENT, so why should I pay the compensation?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
